message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience significantly. Considering its unique features and benefits, I would like to extend an exclusive offer of $15000 for you to consider. I believe this investment will pay off greatly for you.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're providing with your product. However, I'm currently looking at my budget and am only able to commit up to $14500 for this purchase. I hope this revised offer aligns better with your business needs.

Thank you for considering our product, Bob. I understand your current budget constraints. In light of your offer, I would like to present a compromise that might work for both of us. I propose a price of $14750 for the product. This still reflects the high value we place on it, while being more accessible within your budget. I hope this proposal meets your expectations and allows us to move forward with the transaction.
